overview: No Pain No GPA Gain: Vienna Black’s father is fed up: it doesn’t matter how many after-school programs he signs Vienna up for, or how much money he spends on expensive, high-tech tutoring technology, Vienna is still failing her exams. Breaking In My New Girlfriend: Anna hangs her panties out on the line to dry and goes inside to take a phone call. As she chats in the kitchen, she sees a thief stealing her panties. Bisexual Bride: Abigail can’t believe she had to find out about Felicity’s wedding through friends. That’s no way to treat an ex-girlfriend! Abigail crashes the party to show Felicity just what she’ll be missing. Milking Clit: Shy Ella has never received a professional massage before, so she asks for a female masseuse. Horny masseuse Jillian wants to introduce Ella to the benefits of mixing milking tables and massage. Wet And Waiting: When Madison’s girlfriend Kissa forgets their anniversary for the second year in a row, Madison decides to teach her a lesson.
title: Hot And Mean 24
